happy to share some components of the Olson Design system which I use during my collaboration with the clients. Olson Design system contains hundreds of components, icons, libraries that will boost your productivity and enable you to create new and complex UI compositions for both web and app


Highlights:

  • 15+ Components beautifully crafted for both mobile & web
  • Icons organized and easily customizable in external libraries
  • Organized Components sheets with components, typography, colors, and effects
  • Free Font typography based on the Inter font family
  • Vector-Based scalable, clean, and ready-to-go designs
  • Fully Layered layers organized for each screen and component
  • Designed for Figma
